text: Erakat, Erekat, Erikat or Arekat and Arikat, Ereiqat () is a Palestinian surname that may refer to *Kamel Arekat (1901–1984), Palestinian Jordanian militant and politician *Noura Erakat (born 1980), Palestinian American lawyer and human right activist *Saeb Erekat (born 1955), Palestinian diplomat *Yousef Erakat, American YouTube personality, brother of Noura Category:Arabic-language surnames
title: Erakat
